Articles.Content:
My all new KSP series! This one will be the best thing I've done on youtube so far, why? Because I'm putting my all into it. I plan on looking up sceience stuff I don't know a lot about to discuss during boring shots of video.

I plan a lot of features but that's my main.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HUVLSaK4LV8

Hope you all enjoy and can't wait to get some feed Back!

Have EP 2 up, just doing some sub-orbital test flights to gain some science but also spend time talking about real world reentry disasters.

http://youtu.be/SmcBxvM-b7w
